item.title: The Quest for the Atomic G Orbital
item.description: Summary The original article was written in 2021. This is a 2024 summary / rewrite. I never finished writing the original G-orbital blog post and I’m not sure where I was trying to go with it originally. I learned in high school chemistry about VSEPR theory and some behavior of electrons in the context of chemistry (well as much as a high schooler could understand). They showed these cool images of atomic orbitals.
